mapper.insert: insert into tbl_todo( seq, t_name, date, time, todo, end_date ) values ( #{seq}, #{t_name}, #{date}, #{time}, #{todo}, #{end_date} )
mapper.select: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_todo( seq bigint auto_increment PRIMARY KEY, t_name varchar(30), date VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, time VARCHAR(30), todo VARCHAR(125), end_date VARCHAR(30) )
